name: After School (itch) (Zaksley, fuegoglol, JF_Girard, PatMcRea, Zankanotachi)
name_original: After School (itch) (Zaksley, fuegoglol, JF_Girard, PatMcRea, Zankanotachi)
description:
If you've ever dreamed of taking on your school teacher with your water gun, After School is for you! Play as a child in his playground in this dynamic third-person shooter!

  • Clavel Clémence
  • Ferra Laurianna
  • Girard Jean-Félix
  • Lapointe Ann-Laurie
  • Lou Lori
  • McRea Patrick
  • Medina Enzo
  • Mora Hugo

We are the Green Bear team !

Thanks to our friends and family for playtesting and supporting us in this huge project! Also, a special thanks to 

  • eSPACE for playtesting our game
  • Centre Libourne kindergarden and the kids who made amazing drawings
  • Ubisoft for organizing this contest

This game was made as part of the Ubisoft 2023 university contest. It was made in 10 weeks with the Arcade theme.
